Title: Ensure freevxfs kernel module is not available
Ensure hfs kernel module is not available
Ensure latest versions of the apparmor packages are installed
Ensure address space layout randomization is enabled
Ensure SSH PermitRootLogin is set to no
Ensure telnet server is not running
Ensure AppArmor is enabled in bootloader
Parameters: {'steps': [{'name': 'Verify apparmor=1 is set', 'command': 'grep \"^\\s*linux\" /boot/grub/grub.cfg | grep -v \"apparmor=1\"', 'algorithm': 'Not Null'}, {'name': 'Verify security=apparmor is set', 'command': 'grep \"^\\s*linux\" /boot/grub/grub.cfg | grep -v \"security=apparmor\"', 'algorithm': 'Not Null'}]}

Title: Ensure security updates are applied
Parameters: {'steps': [{'name': 'Ensure unattended-upgrades package is installed', 'type': 'script', 'target_script': 'check_package.sh', 'script_params': ['unattended-upgrades', 'installed'], 'algorithm': 'Contain', 'expected_value': 'Passed'}, {'name': 'Check for system boot time', 'type': 'command', 'command': 'who -b', 'algorithm': 'Null', 'expected_value': ''}]}
